content: Hi I separated in October last year and I need to contact DFAS so I can get copies of some LESs from 2007. Can anyone give me a direct way to contact them?
reply: Hi I separated in October last year and I need to contact DFAS so I can get copies of some LESs from 2007. Can anyone give me a direct way to contact them?

title: How do I contact DFAS

content: Here you go... http://www.military.com/benefits/military-pay/retired-pay/retirement-paychecks Contacts For further information concerning Reports of Eligibility, Certificates of Entitlement, and other requirements, contact: Defense Finance and Accounting Center Attn: DE/FRB 6760 E. Irvington Place Denver, CO 80279-6000 If you change your mailing address, contact: DFAS-CL PO Box 99191 Cleveland OH 44199-1126 "I know you believe you understand what you think I said, but I am not sure you realize that what you heard is not what I meant." - Oscar Wilde
reply: Here you go... http://www.military.com/benefits/military-pay/retired-pay/retirement-paychecks Contacts For further information concerning Reports of Eligibility, Certificates of Entitlement, and other requirements, contact: Defense Finance and Accounting Center Attn: DE/FRB 6760 E. Irvington Place Denver, CO 80279-6000 If you change your mailing address, contact: DFAS-CL PO Box 99191 Cleveland OH 44199-1126 "I know you believe you understand what you think I said, but I am not sure you realize that what you heard is not what I meant." - Oscar Wilde
title: How do I contact DFAS

content: 1 800 321 1080, here is a name, Steve E. Turner, Deputy Director, Operations.
reply: 1 800 321 1080, here is a name, Steve E. Turner, Deputy Director, Operations.
title: How do I contact DFAS

content: Here's a list of my future goals: 1. Walk on the moon. 2. Sail around the world. 3. See a dodo bird. 4. Speak to a competent person at DFAS. I'm saving the fourth one for last, it's definitely going to be the toughest.
reply: Here's a list of my future goals: 1. Walk on the moon. 2. Sail around the world. 3. See a dodo bird. 4. Speak to a competent person at DFAS. I'm saving the fourth one for last, it's definitely going to be the toughest.
title: How do I contact DFAS

content: The last time I had any contact with Army finance. I was out-processing at Ft Campbell, they gave me a check for $10g's, and I had this HUGE chit eatin grin on my face. It didn't go away for months.
reply: The last time I had any contact with Army finance. I was out-processing at Ft Campbell, they gave me a check for $10g's, and I had this HUGE chit eatin grin on my face. It didn't go away for months.
title: How do I contact DFAS

content: We had many contact with DFAS. Dennis retired, but before they let him go, they gave him a SEPS check for 52,000.00..... We are now paying them back at 84% each month till all paid. Damn, that hurt us bad...... We don't like DFAS at all.
reply: We had many contact with DFAS. Dennis retired, but before they let him go, they gave him a SEPS check for 52,000.00..... We are now paying them back at 84% each month till all paid. Damn, that hurt us bad...... We don't like DFAS at all.

title: How do I contact DFAS

content: Sarg, there is no interest. The money will be paid back in 27 months. They are taking 1926.00 per month. My dad bailed us out though, loaned us money to live on, now we are paying him back for the next 10 years, lol. This whole thing cost Dennis over 72,000.00.... Oh, plus, he is not being taxed on the money being paid back to DFAS.... We already contacted our Senator, Kay B. Hutchinson, no help what so ever either...
